member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.CatController.GetRandomCatImage
member.summary: Gets a random image of a cat
member.returns: A random image of a cat

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.CatController.GetCatImagebyID(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an image of a cat by its ID
member.returns: An image of a cat specified by its ID

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.CatController.GetVote(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a vote its vote ID
member.returns: A vote specified by its vote ID

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.CatController.PostVote(MSAbackend_phase2_cat.CatVotes)
member.summary: Posts a vote for an image of a cat (value is a vote and can be 1 or 0)
member.returns: A vote id and if the vote was success or not

member.name: M:MSA.Phase2.AmazingApi.Controllers.CatController.PutVoteAsync(System.String,MSAbackend_phase2_cat.CatVotes)
member.summary: Updates the vote value if the vote exsists already otherwise creates a new vote
